data.name: Omar Palacios
data.profession: FrontEnd Developer and Hydrosanitary Networks Designer
data.Profile: I am a Civil engineer with 7 years of experience in design and management of hydrosanitary networks projects. During the pandemic I decided to reinvent myself by discovering in the Web development a passion and a great way to develop a new professional career. I focused on Front-End Web Development, I have the ability to build responsive web pages (mobile first) adaptable to any device. I have notions of object-oriented programming, project management with NPM and Webpack. My short and medium term goal is to learn and improve every day to program web pages in a professional way.
